passives.description: [PAR LIGHT] TEAM +8% LIGHT DMG INC. & +8% CRIT DMG.

passives.description: [SJW BUFF] +10% DEF & [SHIELD] +10% & +10% LIGHT DMG INC. (20 SECONDES)

evolutions.description:
Utiliser [CORE], [SKILL1], [SKILL2] ou [QTE] active [PUISSANCE ECRASANTE] 1 fois.
[ULTIME] s'active uniquement quand Thomas Andre atteint 5 cumuls de [PUISSANCE ECRASANTE].
Boss de guilde et Puissance de destruction +24% hausse de dégâts.

[BOUCLIER] actif +10% taux & dégâts coup critique.
+8% [GAIN DE BOUCLIER].
Transformer en [TYRAN D’ACIER] [ULTIME] +125% hausse de dégâts.

+3% ATK/DEF/HP par évolution (maximum 15%).
Les statistiques ne s'applique qu'en jeu, ce n'est pas visible directement sur le personnage.

*+3% ATK/DEF/HP par évolution (max 15%).

passives.description:
+16% DEF.
[Gain de bouclier] +8%.
+24% hausse de dégâts [Combat d'équipe].

passives.name: [Bouclier]
passives.description:
Résistance aux dégâts et aux reculs.
Active [Puissance écrasante] 1 fois.
Active +10% taux & dégâts coup critique.

passives.name: [Tyran d’acier]
passives.description:
+20% DEF.
+20% DMG RED.
+10% [Bouclier].
[Skill1] & [Skill2] +100% DMG INC.
[Ultime] +125% DMG INC.
(25 secondes)

passives.name: [Surpuissance]
passives.description:
Transformer en [Tyran d’acier] en utilisant le [Skill2] active [Surpuissance].
200% dégâts lumière de la défense total.
10 000 points [Bouclier] = [Surpuissance] +1000% hausse de dégâts.

equipment_sets.description: Le set est utile au début pour la DEF PEN, sa 2ème utilité sera pour le boss de guilde fachna.
Full set DMG INC le problème c'est le malus de -20% DMG RES, ce qui fera perdre votre shield plus rapidement.

Thomas Andre à déjà un boost teamfight & dans son kit a beaucoup de [skills] & [ultimate] DMG INC. Overgrowth et son shield pendant son ultime sont basés sur sa def, et on a en plus de ça un boost ultime.

evolutions.description:
Use [Core], [Skill1], [Skill2] or [QTE] activate [Overwhelming Power] 1 time.
[Ultime] unlock only when Thomas Andre get 5 stacks of [Overwhelming Power].
Guild boss and Power of destruction +24% DMG inc.

+3% ATK/DEF/HP for each Advancement (maximum 15%).
These stats only apply ingame, you can't see them on the character.

+16% DEF & +24% [Shield gain].
+3% ATK/DEF/HP for each Advancement (maximum 15%).
These stats only apply ingame, you can't see them on the character.

passives.name: [Shield]

Knockback and damage resistance.
Activate [Overwhelming Power] 1 time.
+10% Critical Hit & DMG when [Shield] is active.

passives.name: [Overgrowth]
passives.description:
Transformed into [Steel Tyrant] [Skill2] activate [Overgrowth].
200% Light DMG of defense.
10 000 points [Shield] = [Overgrowth] +1000% DMG inc.

equipment_sets.description: The set is usefull in the early game for the DEF PEN, its 2nd utility will be for the guild boss Fachna.
Full set DMG INC the problem is the malus of -20% DMG RES, witch will make your shield disappear faster.

Thomas Andre has already a teamfight boost & in his kit has a lot of [skills] & [ultimate] DMG INC. Overgrowth and his shield during his ultimate are based on his def, and on top of that we have an ultimate boost.
